name: Introspection (Chao)
description:
A platformer game where you play as a guy trying to make it over platforms. I honestly do not have the words to describe it beyond that, just look at the screenshots.

Made for Löve jam 2019.

Made of course using Löve.

Thanks to the great guys over at freesounds for their great sound effects.
Specifically,
markfrancombe
monte32
nextmaking
cyberworm
